main event: A naval pilot observed a yellow sphere during a flight near Anacostia Naval Air Station on April 30, 1948.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 25-40 feet in diameter,The object was moving at an approximate speed of 100 mph,The sighting lasted for about 1 minute and 52 seconds,The pilot did not pursue the object as it headed towards a prohibited flying area, The object appeared to be a yellow balloon but followed a flight path that attracted attention.
